TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
> 
> I don't like doing this, but I've been stuck here for so long.
> I am 8 points away from 3 light green bars. To actually give you a possible reason to rep me, here is my fan fiction, starring the orange 4 in their childhood.
> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130473-Before-They-Were-Orange-CHAPTER-TWO](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130473-Before-They-Were-Orange-CHAPTER-TWO)

Tried to give you rep, man, but it said I needed to spread some around first. Is there a way to know how much is actually needed for the next level up?

--- updated ---

Found it; I need 38 more points.

--- updated -- September 19, 2015 ---

Only TWO points away, if what I've read about 100 being where you get the second bar.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-19T21:01:59Z" title="09/19/2015 09:01  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 19, 2015</time> by adsii1970**
  
Found out the answer...

13 rep left to my last dark green rank, here's Voyager recreation Part 2! 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Dher6)

Edit: 8 left!

now 3...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-17T01:11:25Z" title="09/17/2015 01:11  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 17, 2015</time> by SaturnianBlue**

17 from 5 and last bar. Here are some stuff to look at 

My tank thread:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131883-Challenger-2-Main-Battle-Tank-Replica-RELEASED-Ghost-Tanks-n-Planes/page5](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131883-Challenger-2-Main-Battle-Tank-Replica-RELEASED-Ghost-Tanks-n-Planes/page5)

or this awesome dragster video 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZfXrf4Yp5fg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

26 rep till the light green!

![lHUhFGj.png](http://i.imgur.com/lHUhFGj.png)
I need 76 more rep.
I have 42 more to go to the 3rd bar!
4 rep to next "rank", 54 to next bar.

just hanging at 7 more points. I gotta find something good to put. Erm.. 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66465-Work-in-Progress-WIP-Design-Thread?p=2227366&viewfull=1#post2227366](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66465-Work-in-Progress-WIP-Design-Thread?p=2227366&viewfull=1#post2227366)

Animated Propeller, P-51D-1 Mustang WWII with working flaps and combat flaps! 

![8YaTxUs.png](http://i.imgur.com/8YaTxUs.png)
Just 21 points before my Fourth Light-Green Bar! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Just 21 more till I reach the Light Green (Funny thing Columbia, you are practically 600 points ahead at the same time! Coincidence? ![ALbOR7Q.png](http://i.imgur.com/ALbOR7Q.png)

Only two more points till my third bar.. 

I tried posting this through lynx but the forum does not like text-only web browsers

226, long way from my next one.

Tho I got rep from Ted the other day, that was an ego boost ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I just have about 70 to go... that is if it's true I will earn my next one at 200...
37 for bar two! I will eat the green cake! GIVE IT ALL TO ME!
Welp, I just hit 502, which I think brings me to a new level. No idea what the next one is tho ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Welp, I just hit 502, which I think brings me to a new level. No idea what the next one is tho ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

700 for second light green bar. Also, welcome to the light green group!

> 
> 700 for second light green bar. Also, welcome to the light green group!

Nice, I figured it was 1,000. Much easier!

Also, thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D
Currently 8 more rep = 2 people rep , away from reaching first light green bar. Ooh the day is soon to come ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Eight away from 3 bars....

I barely have **5** points for a [blog](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entries/3754-Adeline-Rocket) I made

Edit: P.S visit....

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-18T01:24:17Z" title="10/18/2015 01:24  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 18, 2015</time> by Gaarst**

wow, I've just been innocently killing time until 1.0.5 comes out, but somehow today I picked up three rep new comments, so I guess I'm getting close to my next rank thingie.

Thanks whoever you are for the nice comments!
191 Rep to the next level in the Light Green, needless to say, I have a long way to go.
